      • readPixelColor

        public int readPixelColor(Transport transport)
                   throws TransportException
        Reads color bytes (PIXEL) from transport, returns int combined RGB value consisting of the red component in bits 16-23, the green component in bits 8-15, and the blue component in bits 0-7. May be used directly for creation awt.Color object
        Throws:
        TransportException
